text:
When I ran clang.jl's standard generator for wrapping julia around c library, it skipped function pointers as it is `CXType_FunctionProto`. For C

```typedef int (foo)(int, int);```
Is this right way to do it?
```
function f(Cint, Cint)::Cint end
foo = @cfunction(f, Cint, (Cint, Cint))```
But here f() returns nothing while expected to return Cint

text: You might want to check out if <https://github.com/analytech-solutions/CBindingGen.jl|CBindingGen.jl> works better for your use case.
